function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Decrease in human activity leading to unattended and endangered species","Impact":"Increase in risk of species eradication due to lack of human intervention","Mitigation":"Increase support for conservation efforts and provide resources for the care of endangered species","Technologies":"Remote monitoring and tracking technologies for endangered species","People":"Endangered species, conservation organizations","Owner":"Conservation organizations, governments"},{"Description":"Devastating global economic fallout from COVID-19","Impact":"Widespread job losses, business closures, and economic instability","Mitigation":"Governmental support, financial assistance, and economic stimulus packages","Technologies":"Online financial tools, digital payment systems","People":"Employers, employees, businesses, governments","Owner":"Governments, financial institutions"},{"Description":"Pressure on corporations to reevaluate globalized supply chain systems","Impact":"Potential increase in supply chain costs, reduction in global supply system efficiency","Mitigation":"Evaluation of domestic supply chain options, investment in domestic supply network resilience","Technologies":"Supply chain management software, real-time supply chain tracking systems","People":"Corporations, consumers, supply chain management professionals","Owner":"Corporations, supply chain management professionals"}]}
